alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 12:56PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central El Paso County through 130 PM MDT... At 1256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Security-Widefield around 110 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
